content:
That's the right attitude! It's great that you're enjoying salsa, and exploring other styles like bachata and kizomba can help you grow as a dancer and keep things fresh. You might find that you enjoy certain aspects of these styles more than others, or that they complement your salsa skills in new ways.

Trying out new styles can also help you:

* Improve your overall technique and musicality
* Develop your own unique style and flair
* Meet new people and make connections in the dance community
* Challenge yourself and stay motivated

Remember, the most important thing is to have fun and enjoy the process of learning. Don't be afraid to try new things, ask questions, and make mistakes – it's all part of the dance journey!

Keep me posted on your search for bachata and kizomba classes, and how your exploration of new styles goes. I'm always here to offer advice and encouragement!
